summary: A former British colony in dire need of economic aid tries to play the British against the Soviets in an attempt to secure economic aid from either side in return for political loyalty.
cast: Terry-Thomas|Peter Sellers|Luciana Paluzzi|Ian Bannen|Thorley Walters|Raymond Huntley|Miles Malleson|John Le Mesurier|Marie Lohr|Kynaston Reeves|Ronald Adam|John Van Eyssen|Nicholas Parsons|Irene Handl|Harry Locke|Basil Dignam|Sam Kydd|Robert Bruce|John Glyn-Jones|Marianne Stone|Katherine Keeton|Margaret Lacey|Robert S. Young|Andre Charisse|Alexis Chesnakov|Maurice Colbourne|Fiona Davie|John Drake|James Dyrenforth|Mario Fabrizi|Kenneth Griffith|Julie Hopkins|Harold Kasket|Kaplan Kaye|Marne Maitland|Alf Mangan|Mark Mileham|Michael Partridge|John Payne|Geremy Phillips|Bill Rayment|Guy Standeven|Austin Trevor|Michael Ward|Ian Wilson
title: Despiste ministerial
